ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: how good are verant if they don t have a working backup beforehand :P I lost a couple of chars on test but it wasn t my main server but I still think its a
ygData.messageBody:
how good are verant if they don't have a working backup beforehand :P

I lost a couple of chars on test but it wasn't my main server but I still
think its a lame excuse, I mean are verant really gonna test out all the
uber items that aren't commonly available anymore? pigs will evolve and fly
sooner I think :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Jamie Bedford [mailto:bbedford@...]
Sent: 21 June 2000 14:52
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test


Hate to play the devils advocate here, but maybe verant planned that solB
stuff just to see how greedy everyone who was supposed to be *testing* the
game actually was? I mean, how good of a tester are you if you're
exploiting a bug for 10 hours?
